channel.title: Tutorials for Beginners
channel.description: Anyone Know where i can Find A tutorial on just Making Walls, Doors and Foundations??

item.title: Tutorials for Beginners
item.dc:creator: @Panakotta00 Panakotta00
item.description:
@Panakotta00 wrote:

Not rly.

You can start making your own mod by following https://docs.ficsit.app/
We reccomend to learn Unreal Engine basics first cause satisfactory modding heavily depends on it.

If you then were able to create the sample mods or soâ€¦ then you could ask the modders in the discord server to further get information about how to do f.e. wall snapping.

Read full topic
